name: Alchemist Penguin
description: Take control of the Alchemist Penguin in the relentless battle against his dinosaur aggressors! Face off against a never-ending army of dinosaurs under increasing difficulty--and utilize a huge variety of weapons, potions, and techniques to aid you in your fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card supporting Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft XNA 4.0 and Microsoft .NET 4.0 frameworks

reviews.review_text: This game is awesome! You get to play as a penguin, and fight dinosaurs! What are you doing reading this? You should but this game right now! It's litterly two bucks!
